response_text: The portal is extremely slow during peak hours. We're losing productivity and considering alternatives. Page loads take 30+ seconds for basic operations.
Generally happy with the portal. Minor hiccups with the mobile view but nothing major. Would love dark mode!
Your product's billing API broke again this week. This is the third time this month. Unacceptable for our scale. We process 10K invoices daily.
Our CSM used to respond within hours, now it's days. Sarah is great but seems overloaded. We need more proactive support for our account size.
Love the new dashboard features in the portal! The real-time analytics are exactly what we needed. Great job on the UI refresh.
Service delivery workflows are clunky. CompetitorX has a much smoother process. Takes us 15 steps to do what they do in 5.
Decent workshop but wish the API documentation examples were clearer. Presenter knew their stuff though.
Complete outage last night cost us $50K in lost sales. No proactive communication from Service Assurance. Evaluating other vendors.
Portal auth system keeps logging us out randomly. Frustrating but not a dealbreaker yet. Happens 5-6 times daily.
The portal performance issues are getting worse. Dashboard widgets timeout constantly. Can't run reports during business hours.
Best decision we made was switching to X. Everything just works! Your team is fantastic.
Billing discrepancies every month. Invoice downloads fail 50% of the time. Your billing portal doesn't match what we're charged.
Solid portal but the SSO integration is overly complicated for our users. Too many redirects.
Product reliability is killing us. 3 outages this week alone. Senior management is asking about alternatives. We need an executive escalation.
Quick question from our business review - when will the new reporting features be available? Our AM couldn't give us a date.
Service delivery module needs work. Too many manual approvals. Your competitors have this automated.
Great CSM meeting! They resolved our integration issue quickly and followed up proactively.
Portal is practically unusable during business hours. API response times > 10s for simple queries. This is impacting our customer SLAs.
X works but feels outdated compared to newer solutions. UI needs a refresh.
Login issues affecting 200+ users. SAML integration keeps failing without clear error messages. Need better error handling.
Happy with portal overall but the mobile experience needs improvement. Tables don't render properly.
Another unplanned outage during your 'planned maintenance'. This is becoming a pattern. Board is questioning our vendor choice.
Loving the API workshop! Instructor made complex integrations simple. More of these please!
Billing API performance is abysmal. Takes 45+ seconds to generate invoices. We're building workarounds which defeats the purpose.
2FA flow in the portal is confusing our users. Many complaints about SMS delays and backup codes not working.
Service Assurance team is unresponsive. Portal issues persist for weeks. Our productivity is down 30% due to system slowness.
Good value for money on the quoting tool. A few UI quirks but nothing major. Quotes generate quickly.
Service delivery automation promised in sales pitch still not delivered after 6 months. Manual processes are killing efficiency.
Your CSM team went above and beyond during our migration. Couldn't be happier! Lisa anticipated every issue.
Third survey this month with the same feedback: THE PORTAL IS TOO SLOW. Please escalate to leadership. We're a $125K/month customer!
Billing portal crashes when downloading large invoice batches. Been an issue for 3 months. Finance team is furious.
Workshop content was good but examples used old API versions. Confusing when our integration uses v3.
Product uptime SLA breached 4 months straight. Considering legal action. This isn't what we signed up for.
Our AM is fantastic! Always prepared and brings valuable insights about industry trends.
Portal search is broken. Can't find our own data. Elasticsearch errors everywhere. How is this enterprise software?
Service delivery is smooth but communication could be better. We find out about delays after the fact.
'Planned' maintenance always runs over. Last window was 2 hours, actual downtime was 6. Cost us significant revenue.
X platform does what we need. Support is responsive. Happy customer here!
URGENT: Portal down AGAIN. Service assurance hasn't responded to 5 tickets. Escalating to our executive sponsor.
Quoting tool is okay but lacks bulk operations. We have to create quotes one by one which is time consuming.
